summary: Comprehensive testing of Monacap Trading Pro - All features working correctly. Backend: 18/18 tests passed. Frontend: All pages load, login/registration work, navigation functional.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working: Login (admin redirects to /admin, regular users to /dashboard), Registration (creates user and redirects to dashboard), All content pages (Stocks, Mirror Trading, Company, Partnership, Contact, Software, Insight) load correctly with content. Real-time BTC/USD prices shown on dashboard. Stock data shows AAPL, MSFT, GOOGL, AMZN, TSLA with prices.

login.details: Admin login works with admin@monacaptradingpro.com / admin0123, redirects to /admin

registration.details: New user registration works, redirects to /dashboard with welcome message

stocks_page.details: Shows stock data for AAPL, MSFT, GOOGL, AMZN, TSLA with prices and market caps

contact_page.details: Page loads with contact form (Full Name, Email, Subject, Message fields)

insight_page.details: Page loads with articles and webinar listings

admin_dashboard.details: Admin dashboard accessible after admin login, shows user management tabs

user_dashboard.details: User dashboard shows real-time BTC/USD prices, portfolio stats, traders list
